text:
*Looking for dev for Marketplace App project*

Hey there! :wave:
I'm looking for a dev that would build a Contacts two-way sync apps. This is meant to be a public app published on the Marketplace.

*Cakemail Data Sync*
Data Sync - Sync HubSpot contacts two-way with a Cakemail List
Cakemail Contacts <> HubSpot Contacts

User must be able to
• Select the list to sync
• Map his available Cakemail custom fields to HubSpot
Cakemail API reference: <https://cakemail.dev/reference/listcontactsoflist>

DM for more info.
